      • join

        public static URI join(URI base,
                       String... components)
        Join components on to the end of a base URI
        Parameters:
        base - the URI on which to append the components
        components - the components to append
        Returns:
        a URI with components appended to the base URI

      • nextMessage

        public static <T extends Message> CompletableFuture<T> nextMessage(Channel<T> channel)
        Subscribe to a channel and retrieve the next message published on this channel. This solves the problem that frequently a call to Channel.latest() is sent too early; in these cases the request will fail because of timing issues. TODO this method should cancel its subscription once channels allow this operation
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the message to retrieve
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to listen on
        Returns:
        a future that will resolve to the next message published on a channel

        Deprecated. will be replaced by join(URI, String...)
        Convenience method for generating a file URI.
        Parameters:
        channelName -
        Returns:

      • encodeURIcomponent

        public static String encodeURIcomponent(String s)
        Converts a string into something you can safely insert into a URL; thanks to http://stackoverflow.com/questions/573184.

      • getResponseChannelUri

        public static <M extends Message> URI getResponseChannelUri(URI requestChannelName,
                                                            M requestObject)
                                                     throws URISyntaxException,
                                                            NotSerializableException
        Create a unique response channel URI based on a request channel name and a request message.
        Type Parameters:
        M -
        Parameters:
        requestChannelName - URI of the channel the request will go out
        requestObject - the object that will be sent. Must not be changed AFTER channel name has been created
        Returns:
        the URI of the channel where the response will be sent
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException
        NotSerializableException
